title: Gregory Bovino reportedly mocked US Minnesota attorney’s Jewish faith
desc: Bovino, recently demoted, used the term ‘chosen people’ in sarcastic way as attorney Daniel Rosen observed Shabbat

title: NPP presidential primaries: Kwabena Agyapong concedes defeat, congratulates Bawumia ahead of official declaration
desc: A flagbearer hopeful of the New Patriotic Party (NPP), Kwabena Agyei Agyapong, has conceded defeat in the party’s ongoing presidential primaries, following early indications that former Vice President Dr Mahamudu Bawumia is leading the race.

title: Tricorder Tech: Opportunities and Limitations of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy in Astrobiology
What an ancient jellyfish can teach us about the evolution of sleep
desc: An upside-down jellyfish drifts in a shallow lagoon, rhythmically contracting its translucent bell. By night that beat drops from roughly 36 pulses a minute to nearer 30, and the animal slips into a state that, despite its lack of a brain, resembles sleep.

title: Man Utd Facing Marcus Rashford Dilemma After Michael Carrick’s ‘Transfer Stance’ Revealed
desc: Barcelona have the option to sign Rashford permanently at the end of the season.

title: AngloGold Ashanti (AU) Is Down 12.6% After Upbeat Growth Revisions And Expansion Moves - What's Changed
desc:
In recent months, AngloGold Ashanti has attracted increased attention as analyst estimate revisions point to very large expected year-over-year earnings and revenue growth, alongside favorable commentary on its mine portfolio and operations.
Beyond the headline forecasts, the company’s emphasis on organic and inorganic growth, including the Augusta Gold acquisition and Brownfields expansions, is reshaping how investors assess its long-term production profile and asset quality.
Next, we’ll...

title: Prophet ElBernard apologises after failed election prophecy
desc: Prophet Bernard ElBernard Nelson-Eshun has publicly apologised after his prophecy that Kennedy Ohene Agyapong would win the NPP presidential primaries failed to come to pass, with provisional results indicating that Dr Mahamudu Bawumia is on course...

title: Trump continues to defend Homan, Noem amid immigration enforcement backlash
desc: President Donald Trump took to social media to defend his top administration officials following this week's shakeup in Minnesota.
